nodes.text: The Palladane family was a Human family from the Outer Rim world of Chelloa in the Grumani sector during the Republic Dark Age. Gorlan Palladane was a former Jedi Knight who had gone underground during the Sith occupation by the Chagras Hegemony and its successor state the Daimanate, ruled by Sith Lord Daiman. His wife was Roah Palladane and they both had two children. Their eldest daughter was Aneese Palladane while their youngest son was Jalen Palladane.
